title: How to Take Photos of a Computer Screen

steps.title: Find what screen you want to take a picture of.
steps.content: Find what screen you want to take a picture of.

steps.title: Press the "Print Screen" button in your keyboard.
steps.content: Press the "Print Screen" button in your keyboard.

steps.title: Click the "Paste" in the top left corner.
steps.content: Click the "Paste" in the top left corner.

steps.title: Now, your screen you print/copy is there.
steps.content: Now, your screen you print/copy is there.

steps.title: Release those keys and press the spacebar
steps.content: Release those keys and press the spacebar

steps.title: Click on the window you want to take a picture of.
steps.content: Click on the window you want to take a picture of.

steps.title: Press the "Print Screen" button in your keyboard
steps.content: Press the "Print Screen" button in your keyboard

steps.title: The picture will now be open in the Paint window.
steps.content: The picture will now be open in the Paint window.

steps.title: Press the Home button and the Sleep/Wake button together.
steps.content: Press the Home button and the Sleep/Wake button together.

steps.title: The picture will be in your Camera Roll.
steps.content: The picture will be in your Camera Roll.
